005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.library;
007
008import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.DynamicContext;
009import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.ISequence;
010import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.MetapathConstants;
011import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.FunctionUtils;
012import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.IArgument;
013import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.IFunction;
014import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.InvalidTypeFunctionException;
015import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.IItem;
016import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic.IAnyAtomicItem;
017import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic.IStringItem;
018import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.node.INodeItem;
019import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.util.ObjectUtils;
020
021import java.util.List;
022
023import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
024
025/**
026 * Implements <a href=
027 * "https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-string">fn:string</a>.
028 */
029public final class FnString {
030  private static final String NAME = "string";
031  @NonNull
032  static final IFunction SIGNATURE_NO_ARG = IFunction.builder()
033      .name(NAME)
034      .namespace(MetapathConstants.NS_METAPATH_FUNCTIONS)
035      .deterministic()
036      .contextDependent()
037      .focusDependent()
038      .returnType(IStringItem.class)
039      .returnOne()
040      .functionHandler(FnString::executeNoArg)
041      .build();
042
043  @NonNull
044  static final IFunction SIGNATURE_ONE_ARG = IFunction.builder()
045      .name(NAME)
046      .namespace(MetapathConstants.NS_METAPATH_FUNCTIONS)
047      .deterministic()
048      .contextIndependent()
049      .focusIndependent()
050      .argument(IArgument.builder()
051          .name("arg1")
052          .type(IItem.class)
053          .zeroOrOne()
054          .build())
055      .returnType(IStringItem.class)
056      .returnOne()
057      .functionHandler(FnString::executeOneArg)
058      .build();
059
060  private FnString() {
061    // disable construction
062  }
063
064  @SuppressWarnings("unused")
065  @NonNull
066  private static ISequence<IStringItem> executeNoArg(@NonNull IFunction function,
067      @NonNull List<ISequence<?>> arguments,
068      @NonNull DynamicContext dynamicContext,
069      IItem focus) {
070    // the Focus should always be non-null, since the function if focus-dependent
071    assert focus != null;
072
073    return ISequence.of(fnStringItem(focus));
074  }
075
076  @SuppressWarnings("unused")
077  @NonNull
078  private static ISequence<IStringItem> executeOneArg(
079      @NonNull IFunction function,
080      @NonNull List<ISequence<?>> arguments,
081      @NonNull DynamicContext dynamicContext,
082      IItem focus) {
083
084    ISequence<?> sequence = FunctionUtils.asType(ObjectUtils.requireNonNull(arguments.get(0)));
085
086    IItem first = sequence.getFirstItem(true);
087
088    return first == null ? ISequence.empty() : ISequence.of(fnStringItem(first));
089  }
090
091  /**
092   * An implementation of <a href=
093   * "https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-string">fn::string</a>.
094   *
095   * @param item
096   *          the item to get the string value for
097   * @return the string value
098   */
099  @NonNull
100  public static IStringItem fnStringItem(@NonNull IItem item) {
101    IStringItem retval;
102    if (item instanceof INodeItem) {
103      retval = IStringItem.valueOf(((INodeItem) item).stringValue());
104    } else if (item instanceof IAnyAtomicItem) {
105      retval = ((IAnyAtomicItem) item).asStringItem();
106    } else {
107      throw new InvalidTypeFunctionException(InvalidTypeFunctionException.ARGUMENT_TO_STRING_IS_FUNCTION, item);
108    }
109    return retval;
110  }
111}
